content: easy magic loop top down socks i love knitting socks using the magic loop technique i usually only do 1-at-a-time as it goes very smoothly and quickly…it s all about the satisfaction of seeing the speedy progress yarn 100 grams fingering weight yarn needles 2 25 2 50 mm 40 sizes heel turn child woman small medium large row 1 rs sl1 k13 15 17 19 ssk k1 turn gauge 30-32 sts in 4 row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sll knit to the last stitch before the gap if you d like a quick tutorial check out our video ssk the st before and after the gap together linked here k1 turn row 4 sl1 purl to the last stitch before the gap and cuff p2tog p1 turn cast on 48 56 64 72 stitches pull the cord in half splitting the stitches in-half for magic loop repeat row 3 & 4 until all stitches are knit up method the back half the stitches will rest on the cord the front half will be on your needle join work for knitting in the round gusset set up s1 k5 7 8 9 sts to the center of the heel place a round 1 k2 p2 until end of round marker bor repeat round 1 for about 1 - 1 ½ round 1 knit 5 7 8 9 sts pick up and knit 10 12 14 16 sts along leg side of the heel flap the slipped sts place a round 1 k3 p1 until end of round marker pick-up 1 stitch and knit pick-up 1 repeat round until leg is 6 or desired length stitch and purl…total stitches picked-up 12 14 16 18 heel flap note pro-tip if you feel like you may the heel flap is worked back and forth on the 1st have a gap between your heel stitches and in-step needle over the next 24 28 32 36 sts as follows please feel free to pick up an extra stitch at this point row 1 s1wyib k1 repeat to end of needle turn work do not pull cord through round 1 cont d continue to knit across the instep row 2 s1wyib purl to end of needle turn work 12 14 16 18 sts in pattern making sure to end after a purl stitch repeat row 1 & 2 another 11 13 15 17 times there should be 12 14 16 18 slipped stitches page 1 along sides of heel flap rearranging needle position 1 at this point pull the cord to create the new loop where you have your round 1 knit bor marker to split the heel in half round 2 and have remaining in-step stitches on needle 1 k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 left needle then knit in pattern needle 2 repeat needle 1 remaining in-step top of sock 2 pull working needle back needle out repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 24 28 32
